_header: Hail and be glad Thou vessel most shining
Subjects: chronicles, verse in; Virgin Mary, salutation to; Virgin Mary, joys of
_description: Author’s salute to the Virgin Mary in relation to the third of seven joys, at end of Part III of Fabyan’s Chronicle, Part III, cap. 59, translating Latin verse of which the beginning only is given preceding — one stanza rhyme royal
